turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello Alice, it's Robert here.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes sir, how can I assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like for you to order a coffee for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on Capital Blvd in Raleigh.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which type of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking I could go for an espresso. I just don't know which flavor yet.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My favorite is the cherry mocha espresso.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Really? I'll try that one out then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go with a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And the type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2 percent Alice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You want the whipped cream added, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah as always.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me put the order in for you sir.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you Alice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, the grande cherry mocha espresso with 2 percent milk and whipped cream will be ready for pickup shortly at the Starbucks on Capital Blvd in Raleigh, Robert.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What about the receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be sent to your mobile via text. Did you get it yet?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yes I see it now. Thank you Alice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome, goodbye sir.
